mapper.insert: insert into user_role (user_id, role_id, create_code, create_date, proj_id) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER});
mapper.select: SELECT u.`user_id` as userId,u.`role_id` as roleId,u.`proj_id` as projId,p.`pro_name` as proName FROM user_role AS u LEFT JOIN project AS p ON u.`proj_id`= p.`proj_id` WHERE u.`user_id`=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM user_role AS a WHERE a.`user_id`=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.`role_id`=#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.`proj_id`=#{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT b.`proj_id` FROM user_role AS b WHERE b.`user_id`=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
